response.overview: Coming from her sold out concert last 2012, Anne Curtis will perform again at the Big Dome! The noontime show host of "It's Showtime" is now the most after-sought actress and endorser. She also released an album, making her one of the hottest star of Viva and ABSCBN.  For her second concert, Anne Curtis is very hands-on with the production. Expect more "forbidden" numbers and notable guests that will surely bring the audience to its feet!

production_companies.name: Star Cinema â€“ ABS-CBN Film Productions

response.title: Anne Curtis: The Forbidden Concert

titles.title: Anne Curtis The Forbidden Concert - Tagalog
